name: Kobold Sniper
text: You snipe quickly, making it harder for others to find the location of your attack.
benefit: When you are sniping, you only take a –10 penalty on your Stealth checks to stay hidden.
normal: You take a –20 penalty on your Stealth check to maintain your obscured location while sniping.
staminaText: When you are sniping, you can spend 5 stamina points to decrease the penalty on Stealth checks to stay hidden to –5 until the start of your next turn.
text_zh: 你狙击时出手干净利落，这使得其他人很难找到你攻击的位置。
benefit_zh: 当你狙击时（参见隐匿技能说明），你只会在隐匿检定上受到-10减值以保持隐藏。
normal_zh: 当你试图在狙击后维持隐藏状态时隐匿检定-20。
staminaText_zh: 当你正在狙击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将拥有保持躲藏的隐匿检定降低到-5，持续到你的下一轮开始。
